thread.title: Here's a glimpse at ornaments worth Rs 5 crore offered by KCR to Tirupati temple- The New Indian Express
thread.title_full: Here's a glimpse at ornaments worth Rs 5 crore offered by KCR to Tirupati temple- The New Indian Express

title: Here's a glimpse at ornaments worth Rs 5 crore offered by KCR to Tirupati temple- The New Indian Express
text: Here's a glimpse at ornaments worth Rs 5 crore offered by KCR to Tirupati temple Published: 22nd February 2017 12:59 PM | Last Updated: 22nd February 2017 02:23 PM 0 Share Via Email Telangana CM K Chandrasekhar Rao today offered precious ornaments to Lord Venkateswara and Goddess Padmavati in Tirupati. | EPS The ornaments reportedly weighed around 19 kg and cost about Rs 5.5 crore. | EPS The offering was on behalf of Telangana government. KCR sought blessings for Telugu people of Telangana and Andhra Pradesh. | EPS Rao also made personal offerings to Lord Venkateswara and Goddess Padmavati in the temple hundi. | EPS Rao was accompanied by his family members, Telangana Cabinet ministers as well as leaders from Telangana Rashtra Samithi, Telugu Desam Party and BJP for the darshan. | EPS TAGS
